erigones_sddc_api.exceptions

erigones_sddc_api.exceptions¶

This module contains all exceptions used by the Erigones SDDC API library.

exception erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.ESAPIException¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Erigones SDDC API base exception.

exception erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.ESAPIRuntimeError¶

Bases: erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.ESAPIException, exceptions.RuntimeError

Erigones SDDC API HTTP client errors.

Can be raised during HTTP content fetching and parsing.

exception erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.ESAPIError(status_code, detail, dc, task_status=None, task_id=None)¶

Bases: erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.ESAPIException

Raised for all API errors incoming from Erigones SDDC server.

Parameters:
  • status_code – HTTP response status code.
  • detail – Detailed information about the API error.
  • dc – Erigones SDDC virtual datacenter in which the error occurred.
  • task_status – Task status (optional).
  • task_id – Task ID (optional).
exception erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.ServerError(status_code, detail, dc, task_status=None, task_id=None)¶

Bases: erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.ESAPIError

Erigones SDDC API 5xx server errors.

exception erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.ClientError(status_code, detail, dc, task_status=None, task_id=None)¶

Bases: erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.ESAPIError

Erigones SDDC API 4xx errors.

exception erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.TaskError(status_code, detail, dc, task_status=None, task_id=None)¶

Bases: erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.ESAPIError

Base class for all Erigones SDDC task errors.

exception erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.TaskFailure(status_code, detail, dc, task_status=None, task_id=None)¶

Bases: erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.TaskError

The task has failed.

The detail attribute will contain details about the failure.

exception erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.TaskRevoked(status_code, detail, dc, task_status=None, task_id=None)¶

Bases: erigones_sddc_api.exceptions.TaskError

The task has been revoked.

The detail attribute will contain the revocation reason.
